actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.
Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture, H. Rept. 94-1747 (Part I).

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House relative to foreign palm oil development loans.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to study the impact of the development of the foreign palm oil industry on the domestic vegetable oil industry and submit his recommendations to the National Advisory Council on International Monetary and Financial Policies. Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to instruct the United States Executive Director in each of the international financial institutions to oppose new proposals for palm oil development loans.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House relative to foreign palm oil development loans.
